CONTACT_FORM_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get in Touch with Your Local Library
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: We're here to help you explore, learn, and discover. Reach out to us with any questions or requests!
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Explore our vast collection, manage your loans, and connect with fellow book lovers all in one place
FEATURE_1_BODY: Access thousands of books, e-books, audiobooks, and magazines from your device, anytime and anywhere.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Reserve your favorite titles with just a few taps and get notified when they're ready for pickup.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Discover new reads tailored to your interests based on your borrowing history and preferences.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Join online reading groups, participate in discussions, and connect with fellow book lovers in your community.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Borrow and return digital materials instantly, eliminating the need for physical visits to the library.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Stay updated on library events, author talks, workshops, and children's activities with our integrated calendar feature.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Find answers to common queries about our library app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: How do I borrow books using the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Simply search for the book you want, click 'Borrow', and follow the prompts to check out the book digitally or reserve it for physical pickup.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: Can I renew my borrowed books through the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Yes, you can renew your borrowed books directly through the app up to three times, as long as there are no holds on the item.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: How do I find out about library events?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Check the 'Events' tab in the app to view upcoming library events, workshops, and reading groups. You can also set reminders for events you're interested in.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Is there a limit to how many books I can borrow?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: The borrowing limit is typically 10 items per account, but this may vary depending on your library membership type. Check your account details in the app for your specific limit.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: How do I report a problem with the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Go to the 'Settings' menu and select 'Report an Issue'. Describe the problem you're experiencing, and our tech support team will get back to you within 24 hours.
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Library App
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: How do I borrow books using the app?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Simply search for the book you want, click 'Borrow', and the book will be reserved for pickup at your chosen library branch within 24 hours.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: Can I renew my borrowed books through the app?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Yes, you can easily renew your borrowed items up to two times directly through the app, as long as there are no holds on the item.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Does the app notify me about due dates?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Absolutely! The app sends push notifications 3 days before your items are due, helping you avoid late fees and manage your borrowings efficiently.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Can I access e-books and audiobooks through the app?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Yes, our app provides access to a wide range of e-books and audiobooks that you can download and enjoy instantly on your device.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_6: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_6: First book in J.K. Rowling's magical series

TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Discover how our library app is transforming the way people read and learn
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app has revolutionized my reading habits. I can access thousands of books anytime, anywhere!
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a student, this app is a lifesaver. It's like having the entire library in my pocket!
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: The app's recommendation system is spot-on. I've discovered so many great books I wouldn't have found otherwise.
